CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Alt_Delivery_Street__c <> "",Alt_Delivery_City__c <> "",Alt_Delivery_State__c <> "", Alt_Delivery_PostCode__c <> "",Alt_Delivery_Country__c <>""), IF(Account.Name <> "", Account.Name& BR() ,"")& IF ( Alt_Delivery_Street__c <> "", Alt_Delivery_Street__c&BR(),"")& IF ( Alt_Delivery_City__c <> "", Alt_Delivery_City__c&BR(), "") & IF ( Alt_Delivery_State__c <> "", Alt_Delivery_State__c&BR(), "") & IF ( Alt_Delivery_PostCode__c <> "", Alt_Delivery_PostCode__c& BR(), "") & IF(Alt_Delivery_Country__c <>"",Alt_Delivery_Country__c ,"" ), BR())
CustomField.label: Alternative Address
